comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050419-1200

I found the following exception in my log.  No dialog popped up and everything
seemed to work fine.  Sorry, no steps to reproduce.

It looks like the map was updated while it was being read.  In
BundleSourcePage#getRangeElement, wouldn't it be easier to get the set of values
instead of getting the keys and looking up their value?  Infact, you don't have
to find all document ranges first either.

something like:

for (Enumeration elements = manifest.elements(); elements.hasMoreElements();) {
    IDocumentRange node = (IDocumentRange) elements.nextElement();

    if (offset >= node.getOffset() &&
        offset < node.getOffset() + node.getLength()) {
        return node;
    }
}

return null;


Here is the exception from the log:

implemented suggested code, thanks Brock
